00017   GraphCollection_t::GraphCollection_t(const std::string &collection_name, unsigned int n_graphs, 
00018                                        const EVENT::StringVec &type_names, unsigned int n_expected_values, 
00019                                        const EVENT::StringVec &opt_major_names, bool may_overwrite)
00020     throw (std::bad_alloc, std::runtime_error)
00021     : _graphCol(0),
00022       _majorIndex(0),
00023       _nTypes(0)
00024   {
00025 
00026     assert ( opt_major_names.empty() || opt_major_names.size()==n_graphs );
00027     for (EVENT::StringVec::const_iterator name_iter=opt_major_names.begin();
00028          name_iter!=opt_major_names.end();
00029          name_iter++) {
00030       assert ( !name_iter->empty() );
00031     }
00032 
00033     _graphCol=new lcio::LCCollectionVec( lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00034 
00035     if (opt_major_names.empty()) {
00036       EVENT::StringVec temp;
00037       temp.push_back(collection_name);
00038       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__graphNameParameterName,temp);
00039     }
00040     else {
00041       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__graphNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&opt_major_names)));
00042     }
00043 
00044     if (type_names.size()>0) {
00045       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__typeNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&type_names)));
00046       _nTypes=type_names.size();
00047     }
00048     else {
00049       _nTypes=1;
00050     }
00051     _typeNameList.assign(type_names.begin(),type_names.end());
00052     _graphCol->getParameters().getStringVals(__graphNameParameterName,_nameList);
00053   
00054     for (UInt_t graph_i=0; graph_i<n_graphs*nTypes()+1; graph_i++) {
00055       IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=new IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl;
00056       _graphCol->addElement(a_graph);
00057     }
00058     _nGraphs=n_graphs;
00059     //  return _graphCol;
00060   }

00063   GraphCollection_t::GraphCollection_t(const std::string &collection_name, const std::vector<int> &n_graphs,
00064                                        const std::vector<std::string> &type_names, unsigned int n_expected_values,
00065                                        const std::vector<std::string> &opt_major_names, bool may_overwrite)
00066     throw (std::bad_alloc,std::runtime_error)
00067     : _graphCol(0),
00068       _majorIndex(0),
00069       _nTypes(0)
00070   {
00071   
00072     if (collection_name.empty()) {
00073       throw std::runtime_error("GraphCollection::createHistograms> The group name or histogram name must not be empty.");
00074     }
00075   
00076     assert ( !n_graphs.empty() );
00077     assert ( opt_major_names.empty()  || opt_major_names.size()==static_cast<unsigned int>(n_graphs.size()) );
00078 
00079     for (EVENT::StringVec::const_iterator name_iter=opt_major_names.begin();
00080          name_iter!=opt_major_names.end();
00081          name_iter++) {
00082       assert ( !name_iter->empty() );
00083     }
00084    
00085     _graphCol=new lcio::LCCollectionVec( lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00086     if (opt_major_names.empty()) {
00087       EVENT::StringVec temp;
00088       temp.push_back(collection_name);
00089       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__graphNameParameterName,temp);
00090     }
00091     else {
00092       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__graphNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&opt_major_names)));
00093     }
00094 
00095     if (type_names.size()>0) {
00096       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__typeNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&type_names)));
00097       _nTypes=type_names.size();
00098     }
00099     else {
00100       _nTypes=1;
00101     }
00102     _typeNameList.assign(type_names.begin(),type_names.end());
00103   
00104     UInt_t n_gr=0;
00105     lcio::IntVec *index=new lcio::IntVec;
00106     index->resize(n_graphs.size()+1);
00107     for (UInt_t index_i=0; index_i<static_cast<UInt_t>(n_graphs.size()); index_i++) {
00108       (*index)[index_i]=n_gr;
00109       n_gr+=n_graphs[index_i];
00110     }
00111     (*index)[n_graphs.size()]=n_gr;
00112     _majorIndex=index;
00113     _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__majorIndexParameterName,*index);
00114 
00115     for (UInt_t gr_i=0; gr_i<n_gr*nTypes()+1; gr_i++) {
00116       IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=new IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl;
00117       _graphCol->addElement(a_graph);
00118     }
00119     _nGraphs=n_gr;
00120 
00121     //  return _graphCol;
00122   }
00123 
00124   GraphCollection_t::GraphCollection_t(lcio::LCCollection *graphs, lcio::IntVec *indices) 
00125     : _graphCol(graphs), 
00126       _majorIndex(0) 
00127   {
00128     if (indices) {
00129       if (indices->back()<graphs->getNumberOfElements()) {
00130         indices->push_back(graphs->getNumberOfElements());
00131       }
00132 
00133       // unfortunately there is currently no way to get the array which is attached to the LCIO collection.
00134       // so we have to maintain our own copy
00135       _majorIndex=new lcio::IntVec;
00136       _majorIndex->assign(indices->begin(),indices->end());
00137       _graphCol->parameters().setValues(__majorIndexParameterName,*indices);
00138     }
00139     
00140     _nTypes=graphs->getParameters().getNString(__typeNameParameterName);
00141 
00142     _nGraphs=_graphCol->getNumberOfElements();
00143     if (_nTypes<=0) {
00144       _nTypes=1;
00145     }
00146     else {
00147       _nGraphs/=_nTypes;
00148     }
00149   }
00150 
00151   GraphCollection_t::GraphCollection_t(lcio::LCCollection *graphs) 
00152     : _graphCol(graphs),
00153       _majorIndex(0)
00154   {
00155     if (graphs->parameters().getNInt(__majorIndexParameterName)>0) {
00156       _majorIndex=new lcio::IntVec;
00157       graphs->parameters().getIntVals(__majorIndexParameterName,*_majorIndex);
00158     }
00159 
00160     _nTypes=graphs->getParameters().getNString(__typeNameParameterName);
00161 
00162     // the names are only copied if they are needed.
00163     //    if (graphs->parameters().getNString(__typeNameParameterName)>0) {
00164     //      graphs->parameters().getStringValus(__typeNameParameterName,_typeNameList);
00165     //    }
00166 
00167     _nGraphs=_graphCol->getNumberOfElements();
00168     if (_nTypes<=0) {
00169       _nTypes=1;
00170     }
00171     else {
00172       _nGraphs/=_nTypes;
00173     }
00174   }
